data.eml:eml: Synodontis acanthoperca, a new species from the Ogooue River system, Gabon with comments on spiny ornamentation and sexual dimorphism in mochokid catfishes (Siluriformes: Mochokidae).

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article John P. Friel, Thomas R. Vigliotta (2006): Synodontis acanthoperca, a new species from the Ogooue River system, Gabon with comments on spiny ornamentation and sexual dimorphism in mochokid catfishes (Siluriformes: Mochokidae). Zootaxa 1125: 45-56, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:5EFC4D07-EB68-42A8-BE7D-3E99DA13AF1B
